text: Togolua dangada di langi ga daudali tangada di langi matagidagi, ga helekai, “Ma gu mooho! Di waahale aamua Babylon gu mooho! Mee guu hai nia daangada huogodoo gi inu ana waini, go nia waini maaloo o ana hiihai mouli hai be di manu dela e hagahuaidu dangada.”14.8 Isaiah 21.9; Jeremiah 51.8; Hagagida 18.2
